TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: 包含指定返回 UI 自动化元素时所使用的引用类型的值。 这些值在 属性中使用。These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Full 为默认值, 并指定返回的元素包含对基础[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的完整引用。Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. None 指定返回的元素没有对基础 UI 的引用, 并且只包含缓存的信息。None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. 对元素 (如或) 执行的某些操作需要完整引用; 尝试对中的无结果的元素执行这些操作。Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 如果只需要属性, 则使用 "无" 会更有效, 因为这样可以避免设置完整引用所涉及的系统开销。Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在上设置模式。The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

related.span: 在 UI 自动化中使用缓存

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定返回的元素具有对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定返回的元素没有对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 的引用并且只包含缓存的信息。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: 例如，此模式可能用于检索列表框中的项的名称，而不获取对项本身的引用。

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
